import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import MapSection from '../components/LocationDetail/MapSection'; import '../styles/LocationCSS/LocationDetailPage.css'; const LocationDetailPage = ({ location, loading, error, weatherData }) => { if (loading) return
Loading...
; if (error) return
{error}
; if (!location) return null; return (
{/* Header Section */}

{location.address} {location.rating} ({location.reviews} đánh giá) {location.openHours}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Left Column - Main Content */}
{/* Gallery */}

{feature}

{/* Right Column - Sidebar */}

)} {/* Opening Hours */}

  • {item.days} {item.hours}
    • ))}

  • {location.email}
  • {location.website}
{/* Related Locations */}

{location.relatedLocations?.map((item, index) => (

{item.address}
))}
); }; export default LocationDetailPage;
